verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, Thou long expected Jesus, newline Born to set Thy people free. newline From our fears and sins release us; newline Let us find our rest in Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Born Thy people to deliver, newline Born a Child, and yet a King. newline Born to reign in us forever, newline Now Thy gracious kingdom bring.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: By Thine own eternal Spirit newline Rule in all our hearts alone; newline By Thine all sufficient merit, newline Raise us to Thy glorious throne.
